title: Romance, 50s Style
description:
Sisters and Rivals
 and 
Whatever it Takes
It's the decade before the Swinging Sixties and young love's passions are running high. In this two-work anthology we meet characters as diverse as the sweet, shy Linda and her femme fatale sister, Tessa; the likeable, loyal Lisa and her selfish stepmother-to-be, Eleanor, as well as an engaging group of their friends and family. Previously published separately in 2015 as 'Sisters and Rivals' and 'Whatever it Takes', these stories provide an insightful look at life and love in that era.
author: Margaret Lynette Sharp
